articles.author: Stephanie Lai, Josh Wingrove
articles.title: Trump Says Microsoft Eyeing TikTok Bid With App’s Future in US Unclear - Bloomberg
articles.description: Microsoft Corp. is in talks to acquire the US arm of ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok, President Donald Trump said Monday night, without elaborating.
articles.content:
Microsoft Corp. is in talks to acquire the US arm of ByteDance Ltd.s TikTok, President Donald Trump said Monday night, without elaborating.
I would say yes, Trump told reporters aboard Air Force One… [+124 chars]

articles.author: Michael Kan
articles.title: Trump To Tariff Chips Made In Taiwan, Targeting TSMC - PCMag
articles.description: The tariffs would ensnare cutting-edge smartphone and PC-related chips for Apple, AMD and Nvidia if enacted. But Trump is betting his plan will bring more chip production to the US.
articles.content:
President Trump is preparing to place tariffs beyond Chinese assembled electronics to computer chips made in Taiwan, warning the tariffs could reach as high as 100%.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky
articles.title: Big changes at Starbucks roll out Monday - CNN
articles.description: Beginning Monday, several policies are returning to Starbucks’ locations in United States and Canada — part of CEO Brian Niccol’s Herculean task of reversing sales and traffic declines at the struggling institution.
articles.content:
Changes at Starbucks might remind customers of the chain of the old.
